channel.title: SAS Guides
channel.description:
I just wondered if anyone Knew where i can get the SAS training books in PDF or anything. free tho. i remember someone brought out the Jamie Oliver book on pdf and sent it around, just wondered if anyone had done it with these.
Just a download will do.
Things included:
SAS survival guide SAS Self Defense Guide SAS Guide to tracking
And all the others there are.
Would be much appreciated

item.title: SAS Guides
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Lmao.

Do they train on themselfs with live bullets?

the sas dont look down the sight. they use the torch for aiming. that way when they storm in they can shoot accuratly fast.

The SAS arnt called the invincible soldiers for anything.

EDIT:

Still need em

item.title: SAS Guides
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:142263”][quote author=pko link=topic=194632.msg1748591#msg1748591 date=1189500516]
jesus christ, learn to google.
[/quote]
Hes right , you did not google…
The first thing appeared when i searched “SAS survival guide” on google , was this!..
http://www.disasterguide.org/download.html
Just put your info and download…

[quote]FREE Emergency Preparedness Guidebook!

Download the 46-page book

Do you know how to prepare for an emergency or disaster? Do you have emergency water storage? What steps should you take for better emergency preparedness? Our emergency guidebook has emergency checklists, preparedness tips, and much more!

* Learn about emergency water storage
* How to create an emergency prepareness plan
* How to make 72 hour kits
* How to prepare for disasters
* What to do before, during, and after emergencies
* How and when to shut off utilities
* How to purify and store water
* How to make first aid kits and earthquake kits
* How to be prepared for the long term [/quote][/quote]

Are you a fucking retard or something?

SAS as in SPECIAL AIR SERVICE as in One of the best / is the best Elite units in the world SAS.

Read what i ask for before you make a complete dick outta yourself next time.

Read full topic
